title: Status app fail to start in emulator after installation [Android 7.x simulator]
body: ***Type***: Bug ***Summary***: In emulators Status fails to run after installation (both fresh install or upgrade). Likely reason when it may be introduced in https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/6914 It's OK on the real device though. Logs with an error provided below. It affects saucelabs services we use for e2e-tests, so they will fail! #### Expected behavior Status starts and I appear on login page after app launch #### Actual behavior Status app fail to start in emulator after installation ### Reproduction - Start Android emulator (e.g. Genymotion) - Instal latest nightly build - Start Status ### Additional Information * Status version: Develop 0.9.34 (2019021120) status-go vN/A * Operating System: Emulator Android 7.0 / 7.1.0 #### Logs ``` --------- beginning of crash 02-12 05:23:53.868 5283 5332 F libc : Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -6 in tid 5332 (mqt_native_modu) 02-12 05:23:53.868 5283 5317 D StatusNativeLogs: runtime/cgo: pthread_key_create failed 02-12 05:23:53.868 118 118 W : debuggerd: handling request: pid=5283 uid=10103 gid=10103 tid=5332 02-12 05:23:53.887 5333 5333 F DEBUG : *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** 02-12 05:23:53.887 5333 5333 F DEBUG : Build fingerprint: 'Android/vbox86p/vbox86p:7.1.1/NMF26Q/91:userdebug/test-keys' 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : Revision: '0' 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : ABI: 'x86' 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : pid: 5283, tid: 5332, name: mqt_native_modu >>> im.status.ethereum <<< 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -6 (SI_TKILL), fault addr -------- 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : eax 00000000 ebx 000014a3 ecx 000014d4 edx 00000006 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : esi c3b0e978 edi c3b0e920 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : xcs 00000023 xds 0000002b xes 0000002b xfs 0000006b xss 0000002b 02-12 05:23:53.889 5333 5333 F DEBUG : eip ea8debb9 ebp c3b0e538 esp c3b0e4dc flags 00200296 02-12 05:23:53.890 5333 5333 F DEBUG : 02-12 05:23:53.890 5333 5333 F DEBUG : backtrace: 02-12 05:23:53.891 5333 5333 F DEBUG : #00 pc 00000bb9 [vdso:ea8de000] (__kernel_vsyscall+9) 02-12 05:23:53.891 5333 5333 F DEBUG : #01 pc 0007a30c /system/lib/libc.so (tgkill+28) 02-12 05:23:53.891 5333 5333 F DEBUG : #02 pc 00075b55 /system/lib/libc.so (pthread_kill+85) 02-12 05:23:53.891 5333 5333 F DEBUG : #03 pc 0002786a /system/lib/libc.so (raise+42) 02-12 05:23:53.891 5333 5333 F DEBUG : #04 pc 0001ee46 /system/lib/libc.so (abort+86) 02-12 05:23:53.891 5333 5333 F DEBUG : #05 pc 00b5f9b5 /data/app/im.status.ethereum-1/lib/x86/libgojni.so ``` [logcatAppCrashEmulator.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/2855472/logcatAppCrashEmulator.log)

It is impossible to use the current status app in **genymotion** emulator with Android 7.0 and Android 7.1, due to the bug in compilation flags for genymotion's version of Android itself.

Stock emulator works just fine.
Real devices work just fine.

SauceLabs tests were moved to 8.x where this issue is not present anymore.

There is nothing we can do about 7.0 and 7.1 with genymotion, so I'm closing the issue.
